item.title: 2025-08-09 – freecad
item.description:
🛠️ Introduction

I’m exploring ways to model my ideas for a CNC machine.

So i was triggered by the idea of using AI for my design. Which orignially led to the combination of Ai, pythin and blender.

Now i want to explore the idea’s of using freeCAD

🏗️ YouTube – Links

Already some links i found which might be interestingen.

FreeCAD CNC series. Aluminum extrusion modelling tutorial.

FreeCAD Part Scripting in Python Episode 025
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yp6yBTcdcII
